CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Packaged for Distribution stage positioned above or below the Filtered by Quality Inspection stage?
SRP.A: The Packaged for Distribution stage is positioned {below} the Filtered by Quality Inspection stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Delivered to Retail?
VE.A: The value of stage Delivered to Retail is {5306}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Packaged for Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Packaged for Distribution is {8851}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
VE.A: The value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection is {12897}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Processing, with a value of {16612}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Purchased by Consumers, with a value of {2337}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
SC.A: Decreased by {3715} Tons from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {4046} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 10874? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Processing} stage has {16612}, the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {12897}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 10874? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {8851}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {5306}, the {Purchased by Consumers} stage has {2337}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 3821 and 10874? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {8851}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {5306}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, or from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to {Packaged for Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection, from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, or from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to stage {Packaged for Distribution} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} and {Packaged for Distribution} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Delivered to Retail} and {Purchased by Consumers} stages.
